rComments: The instructor was superb in her teaching skills as she had a vast knowledge of the German language and culture. Her methods were incredibly useful to the whole class. In particular her use of visuals, color-coded grammar sheets, songs and videos helped enhanced my learning of German. Prof. Luzi always encouraged students to be more active in class

Ermelinda Luzi is the best professor I have ever had within my lifetime. She is extremely organized and prepared. Her lectures were delivered in a very good and engaging manner. She motivates students, and helps them at any time. If anyone would ever have to take a German course make sure its with this professor!! She's a pro!!

Ermelinda was a nice person, however an ineffective teacher. She did not encourage speaking and was unable to explain concepts independently of the textbook. She was frequently disorganised, and despite insisting the oral exams would only last for the duration of regularly scheduled class hours, many students had to stay a few hours late.
Absolutly one of the best language profs ever. Very friendly and funny. Great passion for her duties and takes great pleasure making sure we understand what she teaches.

Sweet, funny teacher with a genuine passion for teaching. Visit her during her office hours if you're having any problems. She is accommodating and believes that her students can do well. She is a bit silly sometimes, but that makes the lessons memorable. She can be softspoken also so sit up front.
Friendly, positive and helpful. Thorough coverage of the textbook.   Encourages active participation and informal group work (works great for language learning!!)

The best instructor ever. Every single paragraph of the textbook was covered in class. Amazing personality, treats students fairly, goes out her way to accomodate students requests. The best prof ever.
